text: The All The Right Reasons Tour was a global concert tour by Canadian post- grunge rock band Nickelback in support of their album All The Right Reasons. It was the first tour with drummer Daniel Adair who replaced Ryan Vikedal who left the band in January 2005. The band headed to Europe in the summer of 2006 to do a series of stadium shows opening for Bon Jovi on their successful Have A Nice Day Tour, along with Bon Jovi's North American leg. ==Tour dates==
